title: dl
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The dl tag defines a description list.

usageExamples.title: Basic dl tag example
usageExamples.description: This example shows how to use the dl tag to create a description list.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/dl
	/dt
		Coffee
	/dd
		Black hot drink
	/dt
		Milk
	/dd
		White cold drink
